challenges.title: Coding and Documentation
description: All aspects of coding are documented. This documentation is sometimes called docs, specifications, or specs.
This documentation is like a dictionary.  You can look up a word and find the meaning along with an example.
You must know where to find official documentation for each aspect. We will show you as we introduce each technology.
You must go to the docs often to clarify your understanding.

challenges.title: Example of Documentation
description:
Here is an example of a doc that defines the heading elements of HTML.

Click here.
This is only an example and you do not need to understand the topic just yet.
